text: Chef-Boutonne is a commune. It is in Nouvelle-Aquitaine in the Deux-Sèvres department in west France. On 1 January 2019, the former communes of La Bataille, Crézières and Tillou were merged into the commune of Chef- Boutonne.Arrêté préfectoral 9 September 2018 == References == Category:Communes in Deux-Sèvres
title: Chef-Boutonne
